cast.name: 扎克瑞·阿贝尔 Zachary Abel

director.name: George Paul Csicsery George Paul Csicsery

this_title: Hard Problems: The Road to the World's Toughest Math Contest
introduction: Hard Problems is about the extraordinary gifted students who represented the United States in 2006 at the world s toughest math competition: The International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO). It is the story of six American high school students who competed with 500 others from 90 countries in Ljublijana, Slovenia. The film shows the dedication and perseverance of these remarkably talented students, the rigorous preparation they undertake, and the joy they get out of solving challenging math problems. It captures the spirit that infuses the mathematical quest at the highest level.
chinese_title: Hard Problems: The Road to the World's Toughest Math Contest
